meta.title: Startup School by Y Combinator
meta.description: Learn how to start a startup with YCâ€™s free 10-week course. A series of lectures and conversations with YC Partners, startup founders, and experts on how to start a successful company.
meta.author: Startup School by Y Combinator

episodes.title: Parting Advice by Geoff Ralston
episodes.description: YC President Geoff Ralston concludes Startup School this year with some parting advice, as founders continue on their journey to make something people want.
episodes.subtitle: YC President Geoff Ralston concludes Startup School this year with some parting advice, as founders continue on their journey to make something people want.

episodes.title: Startup School 2019 by the Numbers by Kevin Hale and Adora Cheung
episodes.description: YC Partners Adora Cheung and Kevin Hale reflect on Startup School 2019 and share some of our learnings from this year's program.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partners Adora Cheung and Kevin Hale reflect on Startup School 2019 and share some of our learnings from this year's program.

episodes.title: How to Lead by Ali Rowghani
episodes.description: To succeed in building a big company in the long-term, founders must become good at leading, motivating, and retaining great people. Ali Rowghani, YC Partner and CEO of the YC Continuity Fund, takes from his experience working with great leaders to share his three observations on leadership.
episodes.subtitle: Ali Rowghani, YC Partner and CEO of the YC Continuity Fund, takes from his experience working with great leaders to share his three observations on leadership.

episodes.title: Advice for Hard-tech and Biotech Founders by Jared Friedman
episodes.description: YC Partner Jared Friedman covers hard-tech companies and why founders should consider starting one. He also covers a couple of the most common problems hard-tech companies face and how to solve them, with examples from seven YC companies.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Jared Friedman covers hard-tech companies and why founders should consider starting one. He also covers a couple of the most common problems hard-tech companies face and how to solve them, with examples from seven YC companies.

episodes.title: Modern Startup Financing by Carolynn Levy
episodes.description: YC Partner and GC Carolynn Levy details the basics of startup financing and how modern early stage rounds of financing are done using convertible securities, like the SAFE.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner and GC Carolynn Levy details the basics of startup financing and how modern early stage rounds of financing are done using convertible securities, like the SAFE.

episodes.title: Evaluating Startup Ideas Pt. 2 by Kevin Hale
episodes.description: In this lecture, YC Partner Kevin Hale goes over how to package up your idea and communicate it to an investor. He shares his tips on how to craft your pitch in a clear and concise way that effectively grabs your audience's attention.
episodes.subtitle: In this lecture, YC Partner Kevin Hale goes over how to package up your idea and communicate it to an investor. He shares his tips on how to craft your pitch in a clear and concise way that effectively grabs your audience's attention.

episodes.title: How to Prioritize Your Time by Adora Cheung
episodes.description: YC Partner Adora Cheung shares her framework for how founders can efficiently make use of their time. She covers ways to identify and prioritize tasks, in addition to how you can measure their impact on your company.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Adora Cheung shares her framework for how founders can efficiently make use of their time. She covers ways to identify and prioritize tasks, in addition to how you can measure their impact on your company.

episodes.title: Startup Pricing 101 by Kevin Hale
episodes.description: YC Partner Kevin Hale goes over the fundamentals of pricing and monetization, how it affects your customer acquisition strategy, and how to optimize it through a few rules of thumb.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Kevin Hale goes over the fundamentals of pricing and monetization, how it affects your customer acquisition strategy, and how to optimize it through a few rules of thumb.

episodes.title: How to Improve Conversion Rates by Kevin Hale
episodes.description: YC Partner Kevin Hale covers the first principles of conversion, one of the main drivers of growth for your startup, and how you can improve it starting with your landing page.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Kevin Hale covers the first principles of conversion, one of the main drivers of growth for your startup, and how you can improve it starting with your landing page.

episodes.title: All About Pivoting by Dalton Caldwell
episodes.description: YC Partner and Head of Admissions Dalton Caldwell talks about pivoting for startups and shares his advice on when and how founders should consider it for their companies.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner and Head of Admissions Dalton Caldwell talks about pivoting for startups and shares his advice on when and how founders should consider it for their companies.

episodes.title: Building Culture by Tim Brady
episodes.description: YC Partner Tim Brady covers the importance of building a strong and coherent culture early and shares six things that you can do now to help you create a solid foundation for your startup.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Tim Brady covers the importance of building a strong and coherent culture early and shares six things that you can do now to help you create a solid foundation for your startup.

episodes.title: How to Work Together by Kevin Hale
episodes.description: YC Partner Kevin Hale talks about the importance of building a successful working relationship with your cofounders, and setting up processes to optimize for the strengths of your team.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Kevin Hale talks about the importance of building a successful working relationship with your cofounders, and setting up processes to optimize for the strengths of your team.

episodes.title: Startup Finance Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them by Kirsty Nathoo
episodes.description: YC Partner and CFO Kirsty Nathoo shares the most common mistakes startups make with their finances and how they can prevent them.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner and CFO Kirsty Nathoo shares the most common mistakes startups make with their finances and how they can prevent them.

episodes.title: Growth for Startups by Gustaf Alstromer
episodes.description: YC Partner and growth expert Gustaf Alstromer talks about how to measure product market fit, how to decide on a growth channel, metrics that lie about PMF and other mechanics of growth for startups.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner and growth expert Gustaf Alstromer talks about how to measure product market fit, how to decide on a growth channel, metrics that lie about PMF and other mechanics of growth for startups.

episodes.title: How to Launch (Again and Again) by Kat Manalac
episodes.description: YC Partner Kat Manalac presents on how startups should think about launching and why you should do it repeatedly.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Kat Manalac presents on how startups should think about launching and why you should do it repeatedly.

episodes.title: How Investors Measure Startups Q&A by Anu Hariharan and Adora Cheung
episodes.description: YC Partners Anu Hariharan and Adora Cheung answer questions from Startup School founders on how investors measure startups.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partners Anu Hariharan and Adora Cheung answer questions from Startup School founders on how investors measure startups.

episodes.title: Nine Business Models and the Metrics Investors Want by Anu Hariharan
episodes.description: YC Continuity Partner Anu Hariharan breaks down the important metrics we look for when weâ€™re evaluating a startupâ€™s business model and common mistakes to avoid when measuring them.
episodes.subtitle: YC Continuity Partner Anu Hariharan breaks down the important metrics we look for when weâ€™re evaluating a startupâ€™s business model and common mistakes to avoid when measuring them.

episodes.title: Analytics for Startups by Ilya Volodarsky
episodes.description: Ilya Volodarsky, co-founder of Segment, presents his tactics for setting up analytics to build your MVP and measure your metrics.
episodes.subtitle: Ilya Volodarsky, co-founder of Segment, presents his tactics for setting up analytics to build your MVP and measure your metrics.

episodes.title: How to Set KPIs and Goals by Adora Cheung
episodes.description: YC Partner Adora Cheung covers the importance of defining and tracking KPIs to understand how effectively your startup is reaching your goals.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Adora Cheung covers the importance of defining and tracking KPIs to understand how effectively your startup is reaching your goals.

episodes.title: How to Plan an MVP by Michael Seibel
episodes.description: YC CEO and Partner Michael Seibel shares his approach to building an MVP and getting your first users as a pre-launch startup.
episodes.subtitle: YC CEO and Partner Michael Seibel shares his approach to building an MVP and getting your first users as a pre-launch startup.

episodes.title: How to Talk to Users by Eric Migicovsky
episodes.description: YC Partner Eric Migicovsky outlines a framework for asking questions and collecting feedback from your users.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Eric Migicovsky outlines a framework for asking questions and collecting feedback from your users.

episodes.title: How to Evaluate Startup Ideas Pt. 1 by Kevin Hale
episodes.description: YC Partner Kevin Hale walks us through the process of evaluating ideas and how founders should think about their startups.
episodes.subtitle: YC Partner Kevin Hale walks us through the process of evaluating ideas and how founders should think about their startups.
